checkMatch

public java.lang.Boolean checkMatch(java.lang.String block,
                                    java.lang.String player,
                                    java.lang.String type)
Returns the Boolean 'true' if a block, or item, has been matched in 'player's job class.

Parameters:
block - The block (or item) to check against.
player - The player whose job class to check
type - The type of check to perform (can-place, can-wear, etc.)
Returns:
'true' if a match is found, 'false' otherwise

getInfo

public java.lang.String getInfo(java.lang.String job,
                                java.lang.String node)
Returns a specific option from within 'job's configuration section in config.yml

Parameters:
job - The job whose options are being retrieved.
node - The node, or option, under that is being retrieved.
Returns:
A String value containing the value of the option requested. If the option is not set, or can't be retrieved, null is returned.

Returns:

hasPerm

public java.lang.Boolean hasPerm(java.lang.String player,
                                 java.lang.String perm,
                                 java.lang.Boolean opOnly)
Checks the permissions of 'player' and attempts to find the given 'perm'.

Parameters:
player - The player whose permissions are being checked.
perm - The permission node being checked for.
opOnly - A Boolean value representative of a permission being available ONLY to operators should Permissions not be present.
Returns:
A Boolean value representative of the presence, or lack thereof, of the permission node.

createZone

public java.lang.Boolean createZone(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.Integer[] upper,
                                    java.lang.Integer[] lower,
                                    java.lang.String order,
                                    java.lang.String acl)
Creates a new zone from the provided values.

Parameters:
name - The name of the new zone being created.
upper - An integer array of the upper-left coordinates of the zone.
lower - An integer array of the lower-right coordinates of the zone.
order - The access order (allow,deny/deny,allow) of the zone.
acl - The access list for the new zone.
Returns:
Returns true if zone exists as determined by zoneExists.

zone - The zone to check existence for.

A Boolean representation of the zone's existence.

getDirection

public int getDirection(org.bukkit.Location locFrom,
                        org.bukkit.Location locTo)
Determines the direction a player is moving based on two sets of coordinates.

Parameters:
locFrom - The position the player was at before moving.
locTo - The position the player is currently at.
Returns:
An int representation of the direction the player is moving:
1 - Negative X direction, 2 - Negative Z direction, 3 - Positive X direction, 0 - Positive Z direction.

                     int dDamage)
Gets the damage of a particular cause as defined in config.yml.

Parameters:
player - The player to get damage for.
dCause - The cause of the damage done to player.
dDamage - The default value of damage to be done.
Returns:
An int representation of the damage to be done, as defined in config.yml.
